name: paltfromer
description:
Master the awkward controls, navigate two poorly-designed levels, collect some things that sorta look like they could be coins, and blow up a commonplace schoolyard bully with bombs. Made this in 3 days for the 'So Bad it's Good' Jam. It shouldn't have to be said that this game is awful on purpose.

Controls: Arrow keys or WASD. (Right click to change quality)
